metadata.title: CVE-2024-30156 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Varnish Cache before 7.3.2 and 7.4.x before 7.4.3 (and before 6.0.13 LTS),and Varnish Enterprise 6 before 6.0.12r6, allows credits exhaustion for anHTTP/2 connection control flow window, aka a Broke Window Attack.

criterions.comment: varnish package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
